title: [LOVE] Ep. 69: The 4 Types Of Boundaries In Love w/ Silvy Khoucasian
description:
Have you ever felt a line was crossed in your relationship and you didn’t do anything?

Join Ash this week as she talks with Silvy Khoucasian, a relationship coach, who focuses on boundaries and attachment styles.  She shares the 4 ways your boundaries can get violated and actionable ways to repair them.

There is a major tie between attachment styles and boundaries.  Ash and Silvy break down what the attachment styles are, where they come from, and what their impact on your relationships can be.  Silvy sheds light on how and why your adult relationships patterns are a byproduct of your childhood and the parenting style you received.  Often times it might feel like you give everything in a relationship and receive nothing in return.  Silvy outlines how to break this cycle and give in relationships without neglecting your own needs.  Don’t forget to stick around for the post-episode notes, Ash goes even deeper and shares her insights around core values and the vital role they play in relationships.

 

In This Episode, You Will Learn:

  • The 4 main ways boundaries are crossed.
  • What verbal cues to look for when your spiritual boundaries are being violated.
  • How your attachment styles impact your relationships and the boundaries built within them.

 

Where To Find Silvy Khoucasian:

Instagram: @silvykhoucasian

http://www.silvykhoucasian.com/
